title: Blockchain-Based Sensor Data Analysis Mastery Course for Construction Engineering Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Construction Engineering Knowledge, No Programming Experience
context.additional_context: For in-service construction engineers requiring enhanced sensor data analysis skills. Conducting non-real-time learning via LMS

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and analyze construction site sensor data using block-based programming tools.
Learners can complete a data analysis project addressing real-world issues, such as identifying ergonomic risk factors.
Learners can propose strategies to improve construction project efficiency based on analytical results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
